name: March of the Meláks
description:
A game where you control the species called "Meláks".

These creatures aren't very smart but they are capable of manipulating time. They are marching to acquire their crystals that have been stolen from them.

DISCLAIMER: This version of the game has a bug which makes it impossible to get past level 2. Within about 6-7 hours I made a fix which differs only in ONE line of code. That version can be found here: https://radinque.itch.io/march-of-the-melaks-bugfixed

Hope you enjoy it. :)
